item.description:
Join us on November 20th, for some some stellar live music, butt-kicking performances, and coooookies!

The Jailhouse 5 plus 2 will be playing a stylish New Orleans jazz set for your lindy, balboa, and blues enjoyment. Get ready for some janky tunes, swingin' rhythms, and even some sultry blues!

*And, as a special treat, Gina Helfrich will be singing with the band! Sooo cool!*

Never danced swing before? We have a beginner lesson from 8-9pm, which is included in the price of the dance. No partner or experience necessary : )

Also in store for you this evening, we've got John Brooks DJing the band breaks, and a fast-paced performance from New School Swing (http://newschoolswing..., with Charleston, Lindy, and Balboa, oh my! And, as always, vintage and other dressy attire are highly encouraged!

See you there!

Beginner swing lesson - 8:00-9:00pm
Dancing - 9:00pm-12:30am
$18 regular; $15 students/seniors

located at:
98 George P. Hassett Dr
Medford, MA
item.how_to_find_us: I'm one of the organizers! I'll be the tall bald gentleman DJing the band breaks. :)

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Blues Cafe- Live New Orleans style Jazz!
